nodes.text: Lieutenant Tallissan Lintra of the Resistance piloted a blue RZ-2 A-wing interceptor during its war with the First Order. It was destroyed when Kylo Ren attacked and destroyed other starfighters in the Raddus during the Attack on the Resistance fleet

Tallissan Lintra's A-wing's first appearance was in the first expansion pack for the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II where it introduced Tallie's A-Wing as a starfighter hero unit, the pack was released on December 13, two days before the movie.
